alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Mason; McLean; Peoria; Schuyler; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 17 at 2:52AM CST until February 17 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER STORM TO BRING A WINTRY MIXTURE OF PRECIPITATION AND HEAVY SNOW TO PARTS OF CENTRAL ILLINOIS TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation changing to heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. North winds gusting from 40 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Illinois. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very hazardous road conditions. Significant impacts are expected, especially this afternoon. Near whiteout conditions will be possible in open areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A short break in the precipitation is expected this morning. However, by mid to late morning a period of freezing rain and sleet will change to snow, and continue through the afternoon. The heaviest snow accumulation will be in the afternoon, with 1 to 2 inch accumulations per hour possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com

area.areaDesc: Fulton; Mason; McLean; Peoria; Schuyler; Tazewell; Woodford
